code: library(REDCapSync)  projects <- get_projects()                         # get list of cached projects  View(projects)                             # show your previously saved projects #1. set each time in your session (not recommended in saved/shared scripts!) Sys.setenv(REDCapSync_TEST1 = "YoUrNevErShaReToken") #2. set to your private R sessions! usethis::edit_r_environ()                                       #finds your file # Then you add --> REDCapSync_TEST = 'YoUrNevErShaReToken' # then save file and restart R # If it worked you will see your token when you run... Sys.getenv("REDCapSync_TEST1")

title: Get Started
text: following functions represent core functions package.
code: project <- setup_project(   short_name = "TEST1",                #must match token pattern REDCapSync_****    redcap_uri = "https://redcap.miami.edu/api/",  # change to your institutions link   dir_path = getwd(),                     # or change to your intended file path ) project <- sync_project(project)

code: project$metadata %>% list2env(envir = globalenv()) project$data %>% list2env(envir = globalenv())

title: Get Started
text: following default merges non-repeating forms adds right repeating forms. also uses REDCap log REDCap data add key information metadata, users, records. can customized add_project_summary refreshing datasets generate_project_summary R-use. can give filtered data (corresponding annotations metadata, etc), de-identified data, !
code: project %>%    generate_project_summary(summary_name = "REDCapSync") %>%    list2env(envir = globalenv()) project %>%    generate_project_summary(     filter_field = "has_feature" # Raw REDCap variable name     filter_choices = "Yes"       # REDCap Labelled choice,     exclude_identifiers = TRUE,     exclude_free_text = TRUE,     include_metadata = TRUE   ) %>%    list2env(envir = globalenv())

title: Tokens
text: REDCap API tokens equivalent username password. never shared anyone. Ideally, never directly written R script, especially plan sharing future. Never commit file containing token git GitHub forever history. ever doubt mind quickly regenerate token REDCap website. working real REDCap project ’s good practice regenerate token periodically, week, just safe. Precisely tokens sensitive, REDCapSync designed reference name token, “REDCapSync_TEST”. REDCapSync ever wants use token make API call REDCap, check Sys.getenv("REDCapSync_TEST"). default token names start “REDCapSync_”, followed short_name chose setup_project().demonstrates set check tokens…

what: Setting Your Token for One Session
title: Tokens
text: can set manually base R. Unless specifically set token Sys.getenv("REDCapSync_TEST") blank. Now token set R session . restarted R, blank .
code: # Set your token manually Sys.setenv(REDCapSync_TEST="a_FaKe_TOkEn") # again having this in a script is not advised but possible  # Get your token Sys.getenv("REDCapSync_TEST") #>[1] "a_FaKe_TOkEn"

what: Setting Your Token for Any Session
title: Tokens
text: may find want reuse token, may several projects, convenient way store tokens separate location. One way personal .Renviron file. , check always confirm location file make sure ’s part cloud storage git GitHub. can use usethis::edit_r_environ() semi-permanently save token. time launch R session file run token visible specifically called Sys.getenv("REDCapSync_TEST"). Open .Renviron file usethis::edit_r_environ() Add token like … REDCapSync_TEST = "faKeTokeN" Save file Close Restart R Session (Session tab .rs.restartR()). Confirm Sys.getenv("REDCapSync_TEST") reference token ever made saved REDCapSync name. example, REDCap project object token name project$token_name. future, may set token different way.
code: #Install usethis if you don't have it. #install.packages("usethis")  usethis::edit_r_environ() # Now save your token.... (without the comment symbol '#') # REDCapSync_TEST = "faKeTokeN" # Save the file and Close # Restart R Session (session tab) # .rs.restartR() # this will also restart R session for you. Sys.getenv("REDCapSync_TEST") # now should contain your token

title: REDCapSync
text: Several R packages exist using REDCap Application Program Interface (API) , REDCapR, redcapAPI, tidyREDCap. However, “get-everything--REDCap” R package can produce standardized R object REDCap project. REDCapSync streamlines comprehensive extraction two key functions: setup_project() sync_project(). sync performed REDCapSync uses REDCap log update data changed since last API call. final project-agnostic object facilitates pipelining deidenification, deriving additional variables, linked excel sheets, exploratory data analysis RosyREDCap.

title: REDCapSync
text: Using cache previous saves, file directory, REDCap log, {REDCapSync} updates data changed since last API call. project becomes standardized nested R list object can used best R offer via statistics, visualization, shiny apps, ! REDCapSync unleashes full power REDCap API even basic R user. aims REDCapSync … Wrap REDCap API functionality “behind--scenes” streamline use. Maintain local/cloud versions one many REDCap projects updating recently changed records user-defined schedule, daily, weekly, monthly. Automate tasks cleaning, deidentification standard transformations. Allow bulk exports imports uncoded REDCap data using R Excel. Power companion shiny app RosyREDCap leveraging combined strengths R REDCap, users can maintain strong data pipelines include statistics, visuals, even shiny applications!

what: Add a Subset to a REDCap Database — add_project_summary
title: Add a Subset to a REDCap Database — add_project_summary
text: Creates summary main REDCap database (project) based specific filter criteria saves specified directory. summary can customized additional forms, fields, deidentification options.

title: Add a Subset to a REDCap Database — add_project_summary
code: add_project_summary(   project,   summary_name,   transformation_type = "default",   merge_form_name = "merged",   filter_field = NULL,   filter_choices = NULL,   filter_list = NULL,   filter_strict = TRUE,   field_names = NULL,   form_names = NULL,   exclude_identifiers = TRUE,   exclude_free_text = FALSE,   date_handling = "none",   labelled = TRUE,   clean = TRUE,   drop_blanks = FALSE,   drop_missing_codes = FALSE,   drop_others = NULL,   include_metadata = TRUE,   include_records = TRUE,   include_users = TRUE,   include_log = FALSE,   annotate_from_log = TRUE,   with_links = TRUE,   separate = FALSE,   use_csv,   dir_other = file.path(project$dir_path, "output"),   file_name = paste0(project$short_name, "_", summary_name),   hard_reset = FALSE )

title: Add a Subset to a REDCap Database — add_project_summary
text: project validated project object containing REDCap project data settings. Generated using load_project setup_project summary_name Character. name summary create. transformation_type Character vector. Default "default". Also "none", "flat", "merge_non_repeating" "default" first merges non-repeating repeating forms merges non-repeating variables right repeating instruments "flat" one-record, one-row, even repeating forms "none" transform anything "merge_non_repeating" still merges non-repeating instruments merge repeating instruments merge_form_name character string representing name merged form. Default "merged". filter_field Character. name field database filter . filter_choices Vector. values filter_field used define summary. filter_list Vector. values filter_field used define summary. filter_strict Logical. TRUE, forms filtered criteria. FALSE, convert original filter id column filter forms record. Default TRUE. field_names Character vector. Names specific fields include summary. Default NULL, includes fields. form_names Character vector. Names forms include summary. Default NULL, includes forms. exclude_identifiers Logical. Whether exlude identifiers data summary. Default TRUE. exclude_free_text Logical excluding free text. Default FALSE. date_handling character string. One none,exclude_dates, random_shift_by_record, random_shift_by_project, zero_by_record, zero_by_project random shift +/- 90 unless changed options labelled Logical. TRUE, data converted labelled. Default TRUE. clean Logical. TRUE, data cleaned summarizing. Default TRUE. missing codes present number date type, R convert NA make variable upload compatible drop_blanks Logical. TRUE, records blank fields dropped. Default TRUE. drop_missing_codes Logical. TRUE, convert missing codes NA. Default FALSE. drop_others Character vector values dropped. include_metadata Logical. TRUE, metadata included summary. Default TRUE. include_records Logical. TRUE, record summary included generated summary. Default TRUE. include_users Logical. TRUE, user-related information included summary. Default TRUE. include_log Logical. TRUE, log changes included summary. Default TRUE. annotate_from_log Logical. TRUE, metadata, users, records annotated using log. Default TRUE. with_links Optional logical (TRUE/FALSE) including links Excel sheets. Default FALSE. separate Optional logical (TRUE/FALSE) separating form separate files opposed multi-tab Excel. Default FALSE. use_csv Logical (TRUE/FALSE). TRUE, uses CSV files data storage. Default FALSE. dir_other Character. directory summary file saved. Default output folder within database directory. file_name Character. base name file summary saved. Default <project$short_name>_<summary_name>. hard_reset Logical. TRUE, overwrite existing summary files name. Default FALSE.

title: Add a Subset to a REDCap Database — add_project_summary
text: modified project object includes newly created summary. summary also saved file specified directory.

title: Generate a Summary from a Subset Name — generate_project_summary
text: project validated project object containing REDCap project data settings. Generated using load_project setup_project summary_name Character. name summary generate summary. *provide summary_name parameters inherited according set add_project_summary. transformation_type Character vector. Default "default". Also "none", "flat", "merge_non_repeating" "default" first merges non-repeating repeating forms merges non-repeating variables right repeating instruments "flat" one-record, one-row, even repeating forms "none" transform anything "merge_non_repeating" still merges non-repeating instruments merge repeating instruments merge_form_name character string representing name merged form. Default "merged". filter_field Character. name field database filter . filter_choices Vector. values filter_field used define summary. filter_list Vector. values filter_field used define summary. filter_strict Logical. TRUE, forms filtered criteria. FALSE, convert original filter id column filter forms record. Default TRUE. field_names Character vector. Names specific fields include summary. Default NULL, includes fields. form_names Character vector. Names forms include summary. Default NULL, includes forms. exclude_identifiers Logical. Whether exlude identifiers data summary. Default TRUE. exclude_free_text Logical excluding free text. Default FALSE. date_handling character string. One none,exclude_dates, random_shift_by_record, random_shift_by_project, zero_by_record, zero_by_project random shift +/- 90 unless changed options labelled Logical. TRUE, data converted labelled. Default TRUE. clean Logical. TRUE, data cleaned summarizing. Default TRUE. missing codes present number date type, R convert NA make variable upload compatible drop_blanks Logical. TRUE, records blank fields dropped. Default TRUE. drop_missing_codes Logical. TRUE, convert missing codes NA. Default FALSE. drop_others Character vector values dropped. include_metadata Logical. TRUE, metadata included summary. Default TRUE. include_users Logical. TRUE, user-related information included summary. Default TRUE. include_records Logical. TRUE, record summary included generated summary. Default TRUE. include_log Logical. TRUE, log changes included summary. Default TRUE. annotate_from_log Logical. TRUE, metadata, users, records annotated using log. Default TRUE. internal_use logical flag (TRUE FALSE). TRUE, return data_list meant internal use. Defaults FALSE.

what: Setup or Load REDCapSync Project — setup_project
title: Setup or Load REDCapSync Project — setup_project
text: Setup Load project object pipeline.

title: Setup or Load REDCapSync Project — setup_project
code: setup_project(   short_name,   dir_path,   redcap_uri,   token_name = paste0("REDCapSync_", short_name),   sync_frequency = "daily",   labelled = TRUE,   hard_reset = FALSE,   records = NULL,   fields = NULL,   forms = NULL,   events = NULL,   filter_logic = NULL,   get_type = "identified",   metadata_only = FALSE,   batch_size_download = 2000,   batch_size_upload = 500,   entire_log = FALSE,   days_of_log = 10,   get_files = FALSE,   get_file_repository = FALSE,   original_file_names = FALSE,   add_default_fields = FALSE,   add_default_transformation = FALSE,   add_default_summaries = TRUE,   use_csv = FALSE,   silent = FALSE )  load_project(short_name)  load_test_project(short_name = "TEST_CLASSIC", with_data = FALSE)

title: Setup or Load REDCapSync Project — setup_project
text: short_name character string spaces symbols representing unique short name REDCap project. dir_path Optional character string representing directory path want REDCap project data stored. missing, project object current R session. redcap_uri character string representing base URL REDCap server. token_name optional character string setting token name. Default REDCapSync_<short_name> sync_frequency Frequency sync. Options "always", "hourly", 'daily', 'weekly', "monthly","never". check triggered calling function, can automated packages. Default daily labelled Logical. TRUE, data converted labelled. Default TRUE. hard_reset Logical (TRUE/FALSE). TRUE, forces setup even project object already exists. Default FALSE. records array, element corresponds ID desired record.  Optional. fields array, element corresponds desired project field.  Optional. forms array, element corresponds desired project form.  Optional. events array, element corresponds desired project event.  Optional. filter_logic String logic text (e.g., [gender] = 'male') filtering data returned API method, API return records (record-events, longitudinal project) logic evaluates TRUE.   blank/empty string returns records. get_type optional character REDCap API call type. data user ran sync_project. Default FALSE. metadata_only Logical (TRUE/FALSE). TRUE, updates metadata. Default FALSE. batch_size_download Integer. Number records process batch. Default 2000. batch_size_upload Integer. Number records process batch. Default 500. entire_log Logical (TRUE/FALSE). TRUE, retrieves entire log. Default FALSE. days_of_log Integer. Number days checked log hard_reset new project setup. Default 10. get_files Logical (TRUE/FALSE). TRUE, retrieves files REDCap. Default FALSE. get_file_repository Logical (TRUE/FALSE). TRUE, retrieves file repository REDCap. Default FALSE. original_file_names Logical (TRUE/FALSE). TRUE, uses original file names retrieved files. Default FALSE. add_default_fields Logical (TRUE/FALSE). TRUE, add default fields add_default_transformation Logical (TRUE/FALSE). TRUE, add default transformation add_default_summaries Logical (TRUE/FALSE). TRUE, add default summaries use_csv Logical (TRUE/FALSE). TRUE, uses CSV files data storage. Default FALSE. silent Logical (TRUE/FALSE). messages. with_data Logical (TRUE/FALSE). TRUE, loads test project object data included.

title: Setup or Load REDCapSync Project — setup_project
text: REDCapSync project list object.

title: Setup or Load REDCapSync Project — setup_project
text: function sets project object storing REDCap API token configurations required interacting REDCap server. ensures token valid ready use subsequent API calls. Neither function directly attempts communication REDCap. setup_project used first time initialize/link REDCap project. Mainly, sets unique short_name intended directory. Unless run hard_reset = TRUE default first try load_project. dir_path technically optional without user save/load/update projects. load_project can used just short_name parameter already run setup_project past established directory. dir_path optional function can used relocated directory.

title: Setup or Load REDCapSync Project — setup_project
code: if (FALSE) { # Initialize the project object with the REDCap API token and URL project <- setup_project(   short_name = "TEST",   dir_path = "path/to/secure/file/storage",   redcap_uri = "https://redcap.yourinstitution.edu/api/" ) project <- load_project("TEST") }

code: setup_r6_test(   short_name,   dir_path,   redcap_uri,   token_name = paste0("REDCapSync_", short_name),   sync_frequency = "daily",   labelled = TRUE,   hard_reset = FALSE,   records = NULL,   fields = NULL,   forms = NULL,   events = NULL,   filter_logic = NULL,   get_type = "identified",   metadata_only = FALSE,   batch_size_download = 2000,   batch_size_upload = 500,   entire_log = FALSE,   days_of_log = 10,   get_files = FALSE,   get_file_repository = FALSE,   original_file_names = FALSE,   add_default_fields = FALSE,   add_default_transformation = FALSE,   add_default_summaries = TRUE,   use_csv = FALSE,   silent = FALSE )

title: Setup or Load REDCapSync Project — setup_r6_test
text: short_name character string spaces symbols representing unique short name REDCap project. dir_path Optional character string representing directory path want REDCap project data stored. missing, project object current R session. redcap_uri character string representing base URL REDCap server. token_name optional character string setting token name. Default REDCapSync_<short_name> sync_frequency Frequency sync. Options "always", "hourly", 'daily', 'weekly', "monthly","never". check triggered calling function, can automated packages. Default daily labelled Logical. TRUE, data converted labelled. Default TRUE. hard_reset Logical (TRUE/FALSE). TRUE, forces setup even project object already exists. Default FALSE. records array, element corresponds ID desired record.  Optional. fields array, element corresponds desired project field.  Optional. forms array, element corresponds desired project form.  Optional. events array, element corresponds desired project event.  Optional. filter_logic String logic text (e.g., [gender] = 'male') filtering data returned API method, API return records (record-events, longitudinal project) logic evaluates TRUE.   blank/empty string returns records. get_type optional character REDCap API call type. data user ran sync_project. Default FALSE. metadata_only Logical (TRUE/FALSE). TRUE, updates metadata. Default FALSE. batch_size_download Integer. Number records process batch. Default 2000. batch_size_upload Integer. Number records process batch. Default 500. entire_log Logical (TRUE/FALSE). TRUE, retrieves entire log. Default FALSE. days_of_log Integer. Number days checked log hard_reset new project setup. Default 10. get_files Logical (TRUE/FALSE). TRUE, retrieves files REDCap. Default FALSE. get_file_repository Logical (TRUE/FALSE). TRUE, retrieves file repository REDCap. Default FALSE. original_file_names Logical (TRUE/FALSE). TRUE, uses original file names retrieved files. Default FALSE. add_default_fields Logical (TRUE/FALSE). TRUE, add default fields add_default_transformation Logical (TRUE/FALSE). TRUE, add default transformation add_default_summaries Logical (TRUE/FALSE). TRUE, add default summaries use_csv Logical (TRUE/FALSE). TRUE, uses CSV files data storage. Default FALSE. silent Logical (TRUE/FALSE). messages.

title: Setup or Load REDCapSync Project — setup_r6_test
text: REDCapSync project list object.

title: Setup or Load REDCapSync Project — setup_r6_test
text: function sets project object storing REDCap API token configurations required interacting REDCap server. ensures token valid ready use subsequent API calls. Neither function directly attempts communication REDCap. setup_project used first time initialize/link REDCap project. Mainly, sets unique short_name intended directory. Unless run hard_reset = TRUE default first try load_project. dir_path technically optional without user save/load/update projects. load_project can used just short_name parameter already run setup_project past established directory. dir_path optional function can used relocated directory.

title: Setup or Load REDCapSync Project — setup_r6_test
code: if (FALSE) { # Initialize the project object with the REDCap API token and URL project <- setup_project(   short_name = "TEST",   dir_path = "path/to/secure/file/storage",   redcap_uri = "https://redcap.yourinstitution.edu/api/" ) project <- load_project("TEST") }

title: Synchronize REDCap Data — sync_project
text: function updates REDCap database fetching latest data REDCap server. supports various options forcing fresh update, checking logs specified number days, retrieving files REDCap. function can also handle metadata-updates batch processing.

title: View the REDCap API Token Stored in the Session — view_project_token
